He Sure has a Lot of Fight in Him
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): He Sure has a Lot of Fight in Him
By Kuwabara54 on Friday, May 3, 2013 - 10:41 am:

So I was going back through the Major 4 today with
my Baby Doll(Wracky/Pixie) Demonstrous and she was
fighting Zelandia.
He had 24 Life left with like 15 seconds to go so
I figured I'd finish him off with a Necromancy
(because I love leaving
the opponent with no Life or Guts). The Necromancy
did 54 damage so I anticipated the fall but
nothing happened. Zelandia
stood there like a statue. He didn't move in his
normal stance or anything, just stood there
frozen. The words KO and Won
came on the screen and Demonstrous did the normal
Wracky victory dance and Zelandia still stood
there. I was just
wondering if this had ever happened to anyone else
or is this a first? I'm hoping this isn't showing
signs that my 11
year old disc is coming to it's end and is
starting to freeze up...

By Jennimason0990 on Thursday, May 9, 2013 - 09:15 pm:

Don't think I've ever seen an opponent do that.

I think Zelandia has Grit, though, maybe a bug with grit triggering when time was out or something?

By bummerluck on Thursday, May 30, 2013 - 10:06 am:

I've seen it happen quite a few times.

Similarly, I've had monsters that freeze into statues while Colt sings them happy birthdays. I guess it's their way of cringing to the songs.
